page.title: 15A RURAL SITUATION
page.content: We are not really isolated, as the few houses that are in our area are close together. Of the farms in our one km square three belong to my relatives and another family owns two of the others. Our house is on the Dales Way so we see a lot of walkers and cyclists. On a 1 hour walk in our area we saw just three farmers hay-timing, two farmworkers, one old lady and two hikers. The few cars were a mixture of holiday traffic and locals plus two council lorries and the local policeman. None of the houses in our part of the Dale have mains gas, mains water or mains drainage.
